title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Friday, September 8 (game #592)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Google's Pixel 8 Pro is coming on October 4 with a new Pixel Watch 2, and it looks kind of different
description: Google has officially announced the Pixel 8 Pro, Pixel 8, and Pixel Watch 2 will be unveiled on October 4.

title: Microsoft-backed AI startup beats Nvidia H100 on key tests with GPU-like card equipped with 256GB RAM
description: Corsair C8 boasts nine times as much throughput as today’s state-of-the-art GPUs, startup claims.

title: OnePlus 12 leak suggests it'll walk back a controversial design choice
description: The rear camera module for the OnePlus 12 will keep the three-lens array and button layout seen on older models.

title: The GoPro Max 2 is finally coming – and it’s way more exciting than the Hero 12 Black
description: GoPro has revealed that a Max 2 is coming – and the 360 camera could make up for the disappointment of the Hero 12 Black.

title: China bans iPhones for government officials
description: Apple stocks reportedly plunged following the news of the ban. Is this a new chapter into the US/China tech war?

title: Google Chrome celebrates its 15th anniversary with some big updates
description: Google Chrome is getting a host of new updates to celebrate its upcoming anniversary, greatly enhancing the user experience.

title: Mirai botnet infects Android TV boxes to run DDoS attacks
description: New variant of the Android Pandora backdoor targets Spanish-speaking Android TV users.

title: ExpressVPN Threat Manager lands on Windows
description: Already up and running on other ExpressVPN apps, the new DNS blocker will help to deliver an even more secure VPN experience. Here's all you need to know.

title: Charles Martinet shares what it means to be a Mario ambassador
description: Mario voice actor Charles Martinet has explained his new job as Mario ambassador following his departure from the role last month.

title: Nintendo Switch 2 tech demos took place at Gamescom
description: TRG sources have confirmed reports that Nintendo Switch 2 tech demos were shown at Gamescom last month.

title: The Last of Us season 2: everything we know so far

title: LADbible leaks internal data, including emails and social media details
description: Sensitive LADbible data, perfect for social engineering attacks, was sitting unprotected online.

title: E3 will not return to Los Angeles in 2024
description: E3 organiser ESA won't be holding the event in LA next year as it parts ways with ReedPop

title: Toyota suffered a major outage after its servers ran out of storage
description: Toyota IT issue caused it to pull the plug from 14 Japanese plants for more than a day.

title: Todd Howard wants you to upgrade your PC for Starfield
description: Todd Howard has clarified that Starfield has been optimized for PC, but some "may need to upgrade" their setups for it.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 players can miss out on a climactic battle in Act 1
description: Baldur's Gate 3 players are urging others not to miss an optional, climactic battle in Act 1.

title: Windows 11's latest major error has been fixed
description: If you’re an MSI user with Intel components, you might want to download this update.

title: Technics' next-gen SL-1200 turntables are here and they’re as impressive as you'd expect
description: Technics adds to its iconic SL-1200 lineup with two new models that come with a whole host of improvements.

title: Android has a worrying security flaw, so users need to update now
description: Google fixed an Android security bug that allowed threat actors to escalate privileges on the target device.

title: TurboTax launches AI assistant to get you through those tax worries
description: Intuit is rolling out AI across its products, helping customers to understand taxes and finances more easily.

title: I tried the Polaroid I-2 and was instantly transported to a simpler, happier time
description: The Polaroid I-2 instant camera has the look, feel and operation of the iconic Polaropids but with better quality and more manual controls

title: Starfield hit over 1 million concurrent players on all platforms at launch
description: Starfield accumulated over one million concurrent players on PC, Xbox Series X|S and cloud streaming on September 6.

title: Final Fantasy 14 patch 6.5 is called Growing Light, launches early October
description: Square Enix has revealed the name and key art for Final Fantasy 14's upcoming patch 6.5.

title: Microsoft thinks it knows how Chinese hackers were able to breach US government accounts
description: An old crash dump erroneously containing the key was most likely to blame, Microsoft believes.

title: Victrola's new 'Hi-Res' turntables offer Bluetooth LE and aptX Adaptive support
description: Victrola Hi-Res Carbon and Hi-Res Onyx promise high-fidelity wired and wireless vinyl experiences, including Bluetooth 5.4.

title: Google is ditching the Google Play app on Android TV but don’t worry, your library is safe
description: Google's one-stop content shop has felt like an abandoned shopping mall for years now, so its demise isn't a surprise.

description: Apple is apparently spending millions of dollars a day on developing its AI, but when could we see it in action?

title: Fallout 76 made Bethesda better at knowing when its games are ready, Todd Howard says
description: Fallout 76's launch made Bethesda's developers better at judging when games are ready to be released, according to Todd Howard.

title: Good news: YouTube TV may get fewer ads in the future. Bad news: they’ll be longer

title: New projects are in the works at Respawn, EA's CEO says
description: Electronic Arts CEO Andrew Wilson has hinted at new secret projects in development at Respawn Entertainment.

description: Companies could more than halve their carbon footprint just by revisiting what data they need to store.

description: Escape from Tarkov patch 0.13.5.1 introduces new quests and promises to iron out memory leak issues.

description: SAP's new platform will play a major role in the standardization of carbon reporting.

description: Baldur's Gate 3 has become the highest-rated game on PS5, overtaking The Witcher 3 and Elden Ring.

title: Starfield mods blocking your achievements? There's a mod for that

title: B&O has shrunk its high-end Beolab speakers into a stylish compact design
description: B&O's Beolab 8 is set to be as good as its predecessors, but comes in a brand new and absolutely stunning design.

title: Samsung’s new 98-inch 8K mini-LED makes 8K TVs finally make sense
description: Samsung has announced pricing and availability for its new 98-inch mini-LED TV, the company's largest 8K model yet.
